value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|You may rejoice. After much research
in the Library of Embla, I found it...$k$pThe weapon that can kill Hel.$k$pIt is hidden away in the Temple
of Blood.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Veronica... I thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Time's wasting. Let's head out—but
be sure to remain on guard.$k$p

$Sbs2000|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|We're close. Hurry.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Wait—$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,128,0,128,255|$Fi500|$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Yes, hurry. Hurry to your deaths.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,128,0,128,255|$Fi500|Ah!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Veronica!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|So I see that you've aimlessly
wandered into this world, Veronica.$k$pI will erase your foolish existence.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Get back, Princess! We'll head off
this foe!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06B,0|$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Grrrgh!$k$pI will not lose. Not until I can save
him... My brother...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Don't tell me... You...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. I am Veronica—all grown up.$k$pBut in the end, you and I are not
the same person. Two worlds, two
people...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Me, from another realm...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|Hel cannot be killed. But you,
Veronica... You, I can kill.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Veronica, are you all right?
You're wounded...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I am fine. Fine enough to serve as
your guide. Let us go.$k$p$Sbs150|
